title: Ticket #216: SubmitterGroupQuota attribute worked in v6.8, not in v7.0
description:
SubmitterGroupQuota attribute works in v6.8, but the exact same PREEMPTION_REQUIREMENTS expression that includes SubmitterGroupQuota in v7.0 apparently does not work.

Perhaps this code was never merged???
remarks:
2009-Feb-24 18:08:47 by tannenba:
Indeed. Looks like the code was not merged. Attached below find the original patch written in the days of v6.9 (as ticket216-v69.patch). I merged it and brought it up to date w/ v7.0.5 - the patch applied to v7.0.5 also is attached below (as ticket216-v705.patch).

2009-Feb-24 18:25:06 by tannenba:
BTW, it looks like there are a lot of warnings comparing floating point with == or != (which is unsafe) in matchmaker.C. Many of these warning pre-date this patch; some, however, were newly added with this patch.

2009-Feb-25 15:55:52 by tannenba:
Seems like these patches below have had a bug since the dawn of time: if GRUOP_NAMES is not specified at all in the config file, the negotiator will ASSERT. Fixing this before pushing the code into 7.2.x series.

2009-Mar-09 15:44:19 by tannenba:
Alrighty, code pushed into the V7_2-branch. Will (a) resolve the RUST ticket, (b) merge the changes into the master branch, and (c) assign this ticket to GregT for a code review since I put code into the stable series. Greg, please inspect the code commits references below, thanks.

2009-Mar-09 17:21:32 by gthain:
Let's watch those merge conflicts, eh, big fella?

2009-Mar-09 17:58:49 by tannenba:
;) Will do. Were there any merge conflicts in particular that irked you?

2009-Mar-09 19:59:59 by gthain:
[14198]

2009-Mar-10 14:18:01 by tannenba:
How embarrassing. Thanks Greg.
derived_tickets: #327   [RFE] MATCH/ADMIN_REQUIREMENTS
attachments:

    Original patch to add SubmitterGroupQuota and friends to PREEMPTION_REQUIREMENTS.
  • ticket216-v705.patch 27323 bytes added by tannenba on 2009-Feb-25 00:11:42 UTC.
    Original patch brought forward to v7.0.5.
check_ins:
2009-Mar-09 17:15   Check-in [14198]: Let's not check in merge conflicts, eh, Todd? #216 (By Greg Thain )
2009-Mar-09 15:32   Check-in [14189]: Allow PREEMPTION_REQUIREMENTS statement reference many new attributes. The PREEMPTION_REQUIREMENTS/RANK expression in the matchmaker can now reference many more ClassAd attributes than just ATTR_SUBMITTOR_PRIO. New attributes allow this expression to take into account resources currently in use, as well [...] (By Todd Tannenbaum )
2009-Mar-09 15:30   Check-in [14188]: Improve getGroupPriorityFactor() function in the accountant. Make this function accessible by the rest of the matchmaker, and don't consider an accounting principle a group unless it is also listed in the GROUP_NAMES config macro. (gittrac #216) (By Todd Tannenbaum )
creator: tannenba
